pr_title: build: create build-parent-it pom to collect common integration tests set-up

timeline.bodyText:
I think this should stay as is. This the template for the parent of runtime and deployment modules.
The template that needs change is tooling/create-extension-templates/integration-test-pom.xml. I think we can hardcode the artifactId camel-quarkus-build-parent-it there.
timeline.author: ppalaga

replies.bodyText: oh sorry, I changed the wrong one, maybe having a structure similar to the the final directory layout could help a little
replies.author: lburgazzoli

replies.bodyText:
having a structure similar to the the final directory layout could help a little

That's probably doable if the config of the create-extension mojo is adjusted too.
replies.author: ppalaga

timeline.message: build: create build-parent-it pom to collect common integration tests set-up
